law.catch_line: Power of court to which action removed.
law.text: The court to which the action is removed shall have the same power as to its trial and final disposition as the court from which it was removed.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1101.
